content:
Proto Blog is a single-page blog application that I made as a JavaScript practice project. I used jQuery, Backbone, Handlebars, Underscore, Node.js, Express, Jade and Stylus.

The aesthetic is based on Politico, but it's filled with Mega Man themed dummy content instead of real political journalism.

All the Mega Man characters and pictures within this site belong to Capcom.

comments.comment: Right on! What a super awesome fake blog! It's totally the best!
